item.title: FNMA
item.description: score:-47 Chances: Fannie Mae’s non-performing loan sale transaction indicates the company’s commitment to managing its loan portfolio and reducing its exposure to risky assets. Consumer sentiment toward housing and homebuying sentiment have been trending upwards, indicating a potential increase in home listings which could benefit Fannie Mae’s business.
